localize.text: Apologies for the noise, Manager. All of you, shut up and focus.
4th Pack. We’ve a lot to gain here, so try to make it count, alright?
Be serious if you don’t want to end up dead.
...Her. Don't let it shake you.
....Arbiter. Manager, if that's a real one, you're aware we'll hold you accountable, yes?
Half wiped out. It's getting dangerous... Hang in there.
Half wiped out. You can't afford to be distracted, back to it!
Half wiped out... all of you, wake up and fight!
Half of the 4th Pack has been killed. Keep your heads up.
Just because it's a false Arbiter doesn't mean you can take it lightly. Focus!
Eighty percent of the crew is dead. If it weren't for the energy supply...
80% lost. Don't let your guard down! This is no different than in the outskirts!
80% down. This is a tricky opponent, but we have to push through. I'm launching an all-out assault!
...This may be the only wing mad enough to send us to fight an Arbiter, even degraded as it is.
The 4th Pack was annihilated. I'll file the offical report later today.
All team members have been wiped out. The mission has failed.
Unfortunate. We weren't able to handle it. I'll reprimand them for the failure later.
Red Mist... The next time we meet... it won't be like this.
...Be thankful we have no better options for energy, Manager.
Mission complete. We'll submit the mission report later.
That's all, then. Keep up the good work, Manager.
I have a lot to do when I get back...
Mission accomplished. We will proceed with the memory wipe.
...We'll take our leave.
For both our sakes, I'll pretend this encounter never happened. Try not to get in such trouble again.
